description: This Python script demonstrates how to set up and use an agent with personalized memory and session summaries, utilizing a PostgreSQL database with pgvector for storage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Main class representing the agent that interacts with the user and manages memory and storage.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: Class for managing memory storage in a PostgreSQL database with pgvector support.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Class encapsulating the memory component of the agent, interfacing with the database.

classes.name: Ollama
classes.description: Model class representing the Ollama chat model used by the agent.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: Class for storing session data in a PostgreSQL database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the agent to output responses, optionally streaming the output.
